example_sentence_english: To cost too much is a problem.
It is costing dearly.
The item cost a lot.
The repair cost a lot.
The works cost a lot.
The repairs cost too much.
I cost rarely.
You cost less than expected.
This car costs a lot.

example_sentence_italian: Noi costiamo poco per il servizio.
example_sentence_english: We cost little for the service.

example_sentence_italian: Voi costate meno di quanto pensassi.
example_sentence_english: You cost less than I thought.
The tickets cost them too much.

example_sentence_italian: Io costavo meno un anno fa.
example_sentence_english: I used to cost less a year ago.
You were costing a lot then.

translation_english: he was costing/she was costing/you (formal) were costing
example_sentence_english: That house used to cost less.

example_sentence_italian: Noi costavamo di più l'anno scorso.
example_sentence_english: We were costing more last year.
You were costing less before.
Taxes were costing a lot.
I have cost too much for this.
You have cost more than expected.

translation_english: he has cost/she has cost/you (formal) have cost
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
example_sentence_english: It has cost a fortune.
We have cost less than expected.

example_sentence_italian: Avete costato troppo per quel servizio.
example_sentence_english: You have cost too much for that service.

example_sentence_italian: Hanno costato molto per la riparazione.
example_sentence_english: They have cost a lot for the repair.
